general.descriptionTextModule: Manages the import export of the application

activity.invalidHelpText: Invalid records can be downloaded in the context menu

profile.messageSaveError: The profile could not be saved.
profile.messageDeleteError: The profile could not be saved. Please make sure that all logs for this profile are deleted.
profile.messageDuplicateError: The profile could not be duplicated.
profile.addMappingTooltipText: Please define an object type first.
profile.objectTypeFieldTooltipText: The object type cannot be changed when mapping options are present.
profile.descriptionBlock: Object types define a mode for importing and exporting data. The defined mode will also affect the mapping options in the table below. Note, that you cannot change the object type after mapping options have been introduced.
profile.mappingDescriptionBlock: Use the table below to map CSV fields to their respective database counterparts.
profile.csvDescriptionBlock: Separators and enclosure characters are used to indicate separate fields within the CSV file. Separators are used to split single fields, enclosure characters are used to group multiple fields.
profile.systemDefaultInfoText: You are viewing a system default profile which cannot be modified. You can either create a new profile or duplicate a system default profile.

exporter.exportActivityDescription: Activities older than 30 days will be removed automatically.

importer.messageImportError: There were errors during the import
importer.warningBlock: Warning: Imported data sets may conflict with already existing database entries and potentially overwrite them. The changes introduced with this import will be permanent. So be sure to have a database backup at hand before proceeding.

progress.failedImportsText: {failedRecords} records failed to import. The failed records can be downloaded, edited and re-imported.
